Conceptual Hierarchy.short_description: System of organizing concepts from concrete to increasingly abstract levels.

Symbolic System.short_description: Framework where symbols represent and manipulate abstract concepts.

Pattern Recognition.short_description: Process of identifying recurring structures across different contexts.

Category Formation.short_description: Fundamental process of grouping based on shared abstract properties.

Dimensional Reduction.short_description: Simplification of complex systems by focusing on essential dimensions.

Emergence.short_description: Higher-level patterns arising from lower-level interactions.

Type Hierarchy.short_description: Nested system of increasingly general classifications.

Modal Framework.short_description: System for understanding different modes or ways of being.

Formal System.short_description: Abstract structure with defined rules for manipulation.

Recursive Pattern.short_description: Self-referential structure that generates increasing levels of abstraction.

Universal.short_description: Abstract property or principle that applies across all instances.

Metaphorical Mapping.short_description: Transfer of structure between concrete and abstract domains.

Logical Space.short_description: Framework of all possible combinations of abstract elements.

Information Structure.short_description: Organization of data into meaningful abstract patterns.

Ontological Level.short_description: Fundamental layer of reality or conceptual organization.

Semantic Network.short_description: Web of interconnected meanings and conceptual relationships.

Generative Grammar.short_description: Rules system producing infinite variations from finite elements.

Idealization.short_description: Process of extracting perfect forms from imperfect instances.

Morphological Field.short_description: Space of possible forms or configurations in abstract system.

Abstract Operation.short_description: General process that can be applied across different domains.

Categorical Relationship.short_description: Fundamental ways abstract entities can relate to each other.

Metalevel.short_description: Layer of abstraction that describes or operates on other abstractions.

Invariant Property.short_description: Characteristic that remains unchanged across transformations.

Structural Essence.short_description: Core pattern that defines an abstract category.

Functional Mapping.short_description: Abstract relationship between inputs and outputs.

Conceptual Space.short_description: Multidimensional framework for organizing abstract concepts.

Schema.short_description: Abstract template organizing knowledge or experience.

Transformational Rule.short_description: Principle governing changes between abstract states.

Abstraction Layer.short_description: Level of removal from concrete implementation.

Isomorphism.short_description: Structural equivalence between different abstract systems.

Quality Space.short_description: Framework for organizing abstract properties or attributes.

Conceptual Blend.short_description: Merger of different abstract domains creating new meaning.

Protocol.short_description: Abstract rules governing interaction or process.

Logical Type.short_description: Category defined by abstract rules or properties.
